admitted she is ''amazed'' by the public's reaction to Sue and believes people admire her in the same way they respect music mogul Simon Cowell . ''Just like him, she says what she wants because she can- there is nobody there to tell either of them to stop. http://wn.com/Allen_Iverson_19pts_vs_Nets_08/09_NBA_*Clutch_Plays Allen Iverson and Tayshaun Prince stepped up for the short-handed Detroit Pistons. Allen Iverson scored 19 points, and Tayshaun Prince added 16 to help the Pistons win their fifth straight game, 83-75 over the New Jersey Nets on Wednesday. When any team in the league loses three of their top six guys, things are going to change for them, Pistons coach Mike D'Antoni Curry said. ''Luckily, a lot of other guys stepped up.'' Detroit played without Rip Hamilton ( groin) and Antonio McDyess ( ribs), and lost Rasheed Wallace to a first-half foot injury,
